# Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(sf)
library(lubridate)
library(broom)

homicides <- read.csv("homicide-data.csv") %>% 
  mutate(city_name = paste(city, state, sep = ", "))

```


# Cleaning

```{r}
los_angeles <- homicides %>% 
  filter(city == "Los Angeles", state == "CA") %>%
  mutate(
    date = ymd(reported_date),
    year = year(date),
    month = month(date)
  )
```
